p: IAV is categorised into several subtypes based on their surface-exposed proteins HA and NA, such as H1N1, H3N2 and H5N1, among others. So far, 18 subtypes of HA and 11 subtypes of NA have been observed on the basis of their antigenicity (Tong et al. 2013), out of which only a few subtypes are found to infect humans (Nandy et al. 2014).
